Stop the current doParallel strategy

Source: R/utils.R
stop_doParallel_strategy.Rd

Stops the given cluster, using parallel::stopCluster(), if strategy=="parallel".

Usage

stop_doParallel_strategy(strategy = c("sequential", "parallel"), cl)

Arguments

strategy

One of "sequential" (default) or "parallel".

cl

Cluster object, returned by start_doParallel_strategy(), called with the same strategy.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
cl <- start_doParallel_strategy("parallel", n_workers=3)
stop_doParallel_strategy("parallel", cl)
} # }
